At the beginning of each turn, bacteria on each "infected field" (a field with a bacteria on it) which neighbors exactly one other infected field, will spread into another neighboring field. Afterwards, bacteria can move to neighboring fields. Where bacteria of two players meet, the one with more units will win, with both players losing as many units as the loser had. 
A player who can conquer an enemies home base wins.

Name: University of Tokyo Too Far
Description:
University of Tokyo Too Far is a board wargame that reproduces the battle between riot police and radicals in the Kanda Liberation Zone Struggle, which is hidden behind the Yasuda Auditorium incident at the University of Tokyo.

In the "Kanda Liberation Zone Struggle", the students of Chuo University, Meiji University, Nihon University and Sophia University advanced from their university campus in the Kanda area to the Hongo campus of the University of Tokyo in order to help the "alumni" (& new left-wing sects) who stood up in the Yasuda Auditorium incident at the University of Tokyo. They clashed with riot police and failed to arrive at the University of Tokyo after all. The process is reminiscent of the "Operation Market Garden", which was the subject of the movie "A Bridge Too Far".

University of Tokyo Too Far is a sequel to Storm over Yasuda Auditorium, University of Tokyo.

Name: Operations Research for COVID-19
Description:
A solitaire game to play now that the spread of the new coronavirus infection has not ended!!

The player must control the spread of the infection while at the same time minimizing the impact on the economy. How do you control both the deaths caused by the infection and the deaths caused by the economy? As a working secretary (a fictional post) of the Infectious Disease Control Headquarters, the player makes various policy proposals.

This game is also a challenging crisis management simulation.

Name: Coloma: Long Shadow Promo Card
Description:
A promo card originally available as part of The Secret Cabal's 2020 Kickstarter campaign.

A new Pioneer Specialty Card. This character can discard Barrel tokens from your supply to remove Outlaws from the Shootout. For each barrel you remove, you gain 1 VP.

Name: Threason
Description:
Threason is a tactical card game in which two players or teams fight for supremacy in an epic fantasy world.
You must coordinate your units special abilities to outmanoeuvre your enemies' ones, to finally slay the Hero of your opposite clan.
Units can be in different states, which determines the number and type of actions they can take.
When a unit suffers attacks from the rival, its status weakens until it is completely destroyed.
Attacking your opponent's units prevents them from using the powerful effects of their special abilities.
But keep in mind that, when the rival hero finds himself on the verge of death, he becomes a tough adversary and he will not hesitate to sacrifice his own allies to claim victory for his own.

—description from the designer

Name: Crimson
Description:
Crimson is a semi-cooperative card game for 3-6 people in which you’ll need to complete a bloody ritual to summon the Crimson Overlord to achieve dominance over the Groundhog Kingdom.

Players are members of the Crimson Brotherhood and will give their own blood to complete the summoning, while holding against the forces of the Golden Groundhog.
But beware, because each player must also complete their own mission, and your teammates may not see your well-being in their best interests.

HOW TO PLAY:
Players will take turns to offer their blood in the ritual pool, recover energy and spells, and fight their enemies… or themselves.
In their turn, players play action cards (unique to each character) and spell cards (drawn from a common deck)

To WIN the game, players must complete the ritual circle, achieve their secret objective, and survive.

—description from the designer

Name: Amukti Palapa
Description: Redesigned Surakarta with stacking and 7x7 grid instead of 6x6. Players can stack pieces such that only opponent's pieces of the same height or taller can capture them. Each players has 11 one-star soldiers (prajurit), two two-star soldiers (bekel), one three-star soldier (senopati) and one flagbearer (panji perang). Two-star soldiers can capture stacks of two opponent's soldiers while three-star soldiers can capture stacks of three opponent's soldiers on their own.

Name: Stolen at Sea
Description:
A handmade escape room style mystery game to play at home.

Travel back in time to 1923 as passengers aboard the RMS Aquitania. Sift through old maps, a 100 year old book, secret documents and strange photographs. Decipher Morse code and Egyptian hieroglyphics as you race to solve an exciting interactive mystery. Find hidden clues and untangle intriguing riddles to rescue a priceless jewel of antiquity in this challenging, high stakes puzzle quest!

You'll join the highly trained MI6 officers as they work against the clock to solve the theft of the magnificent burial ring of Pharaoh Ramses II that was on its return voyage to the Cairo Museum of Antiquities.

As you and the agents follow 6 passengers around the ship, you’ll discover each has a mysterious story that will provide important clues. The priceless ring must be found before the ship arrives in the Port of Alexandria in one hour. No one will be allowed to leave the ship until the jewel is returned.

This is a 60-minute escape room game in a box to play at home. Race to solve an exciting interactive mystery by finding hidden clues and completing intriguing puzzles. Locked document bags are hidden “doors” that move you through the game.

The game works best with 2 to 6 players ages 14 and older. No internet is required. It can be played again so pack it up and pass it on.

-description from publisher

Name: BattleTech: Alpha Strike – Commander's Edition
Description:
Command Your Destiny!

In the BattleTech universe there remains one constant: the drums of war.  And where there is war, valiant military commanders from the Greta Houses, the Clans, and other interstellar nations lead the charge of hulking BattleMechs, brave infantry, and daring aerofighters to certain victory or crushing defeat on the sprawling battlefields of distance worlds.  Rally your troops onward into the fray, and surge forth to triumph over the enemy.

AlphaStrike: Commander's Edition collect into one handy volume the revised fast-play rules from the original Alpha Strike and the expanded rules from Alpha Strike Companion.  Take command of large-scale engagements with tabletop-miniatures gameplay designed for the modern wargamer.  Use the force-creation rules to marshal your armies, charge them into battle, and either reap the rewards of conquest or taste the bitter pill of defeat.  The future of the Inner Sphere is in your hands!

—description from the publisher

Name: Crimibox: Dossier Macdeath – Episode I
Description:
Solve your own murder mystery. With the help of a chat bot you investigate police files, photo's and evidence. Search the internet and use social media to unravel the secrets of your suspects.

On the stage the actors play Shakespeare's Macbeth, but behind the scenes another tragedy takes place. The final curtain falls for the young Maarten.

Unravel the mystery in the first episode of this gripping trilogy. With each episode you advance further in your investigation until you reach the final epilogue in the third episode.

Unmask the gruesome murderer before he strikes again!

Some of the features included in this game:
- Analyse police documents
- Watch video footage
- Send e-mails to witnesses
- Search police databases
- Scour social media for clues

And much more!

—description from the publisher (translated)

Name: Crimibox: Dossier Macdeath – Episode II
Description:
Solve your own murder mystery. With the help of a chat bot you investigate police files, photo's and evidence. Search the internet and use social media to unravel the secrets of your suspects.

On the stage the actors play Shakespeare's Macbeth, but behind the scenes another tragedy takes place. The final curtain falls for the young Maarten.

Unravel the mystery in the second episode of this gripping trilogy. With each episode you advance further in your investigation until you reach the final epilogue in the third episode.

Unmask the gruesome murderer before he strikes again!

Some of the features included in this game:
- Analyse police documents
- Watch video footage
- Send e-mails to witnesses
- Search police databases
- Scour social media for clues

And much more!

—description from the publisher (translated)

Name: Crimibox: Dossier Undercover
Description:
Solve your own murder mystery. With the help of a chat bot you investigate police files, photo's and evidence. Search the internet and use social media to unravel the secrets of your suspects.

Walk into the footsteps of undercover agents Bob and Kim. Infiltrate the crime scene where drug trafficking and arms trafficking are rampant.

Explore the police files and question your suspects. Follow  leads to the web and social media in your search for the truth. But be careful not to blow up your own cover. How far will you go to get the killer?

The Undercover Crimibox contains a lifelike paper police file, evidence and a mysterious cover with exciting clues that you can explore further online.

—description from the publisher (translated)

Name: Crimibox: Dossier Inkt
Description:
Just after securing a monster deal for his new book, Menno Morris is found dead behind his desk. The evidence appears to indicate suicide. But where is Menno's cell phone? And where is his mysterious manuscript that all this research seems to revolve around?

In this case, fiction and terrifying reality merge seamlessly. Where does the story end and where does the truth begin? Will Menno's murderer get away with his atrocity or will you rewrite the end of this case?

Some features:
- Unravel passwords
- Study lifelike websites
- Search social media
- Question your suspects
- Call to mysterious numbers

—description from the publisher (translated)

Name: メイドマフィア！(Maid Mafia!: Maid x Gun x Tea)
Description:
A long time ago, Japan was banned from black tea due to the war with Britain.

But people couldn't resist the charm of black tea.

Beautiful colors peeking out of the cup, unique scent, and noble and mellow taste...

The rich people raised a lot of money in search of black tea, and some people tried to fulfill their wishes.

That was the moment when the mafia organization "Yokohama Syndicate" specializing in black tea was born in the port city of Yokohama.

And time has passed and it is modern.

Black tea has not been lifted yet, mafias continue to carry it...

Times have changed, but things haven't changed, and people call them wearing maid clothes and paint guns, Maid Mafia!

Maid Mafia! is a game of smuggling. Each player moves around Yokohama city, gathers armed maids (fifteen in total) and traffics in black tea. A player who got three victory point cards first wins, but if the police act a certain number of times, all the players lose.

Name: レコードマイスター (Record Meister)
Description:
In a mysterious coffee shop, customers are asking for the song they want to hear now. Let's become "Meisters" who work in coffee shops, select the right songs that customers want, and play them!

120 songs from 120 artists can be selected as cards by Record Meister! The selection genres range from pop music that everyone knows to rock, classic, jazz, reggae, Latin, fusion, metal, EDM, techno, game music, movie music, bokaro, and so on. There is no doubt that you will encounter new music through the game that you have never heard before.

Each turn, one player will play as the customer while the others will be the "Meisters".

The customer draw a topic card, chooses one topic on the card and announces it to the meisters.

Then, all the meisters start looking for a song among the vinyl cards on the table.

Each meister plays the song he selected (using a QR code on the card) and explains how the song matches the topic.

Once all the meisters have talked, the customer selects the best song and the selected meister get 1 point (keeping the vinyl card).

Play several rounds. The most points at the end of the game wins.

Name: Warden Chronicles
Description:
Troubled times plague the lands of Naggoru; the Nul'Te tribes have isolated themselves, the Kuldrak have grown restless and push beyond their limits. And new dark forces rise on the furthest borders of the lands. Take on the role of a Warden leader from one of the three races, set forth from the capital, and uncover the lands facing all obstacles before you.

Warden Chronicles is an open-world exploration adventure, which can be played in a series of one-shot stand-alone chronicles or a chronicle campaign, which will see your character grow, becoming more powerful as skills and abilities carry over from one chronicle to the next. Players will discover new locations, deal with character and world-shaping events, defend trade destroy or rebuild settlements, gain renown, recruit powerful heroes to join the adventure, and engage in combat versus hostile forces.

Rough Game Flow
Players will start in the main citadel location, placing their standee/mini in this space; players will then branch out either individually or group together to explore the world. As players explore the world more tiles will be uncovered, new locations will be unlocked for interaction, and enemies will make themselves known. After a player or party has finished taking their actions, they will be required to draw and resolve an event card, which will impact the player or group and how they develop their characters.

Wardens
The Wardens are the leader characters that players will take charge of through the course of a Chronicle or a Chronicle Campaign. Each Warden starts with their own asymmetric leader card, abilities deck, and board that will provide players with unique play. Through the course of the game, players will decide how they wish to build their Warden out as they gain experience, complete personal quests, and overcome events. You decide will you build out your player board with specialised abilities? Expand your player ability deck and look to increase your hand size? Recruit a larger honour guard of heroes to aid you?

—description from the designer

Name: インザルーイン (In the Ruin)
Description:
ï½žYou are an explorer in search of a mysterious gem (crystal) hidden in ancient ruins.
Take on the challenge of these mysterious ruins, which take on a different form for each visitor.
The winner is the one who finds more gems, reveals more of the ruins, and makes it back alive. ï½žIn The Ruins

In the Ruins is a new type of paper pen game where you move the pieces on the paper you fill out.

Like a dungeon PRG, you can draw your own dungeon map by filling in walls and passages on a grid.

By moving the explorer on the drawn map, various scoring elements are connected in a chain.

The winner's map with the most points looks the best! That's what this game is all about.

Name: Vierundfertig
Description:
Vierundfertig is based on the Connect 4 concept - the winner is the first player who manages to create a line of four cubes, either horizontally, vertically or diagonally.
The board has a row of seven fields. The active player rolls a die, enters one of their pieces on any empty field and moves the number of steps rolled, either horizontically or vertically (climbing onto other pieces). In subsequent turns, players can choose between entering a new piece and moving a piece already on the board (provided no other piece stands on top of it). Towers that are seven pieces high are demolished and the pieces returned to their owners; if a player has no pieces left, the highest tower is taken down. First player to get 4 in a row is the winner.

Name: Code van Coppens
Description:
Exciting challenges and awesome stunts. That's how we know the Coppens brothers from TV. With Coppens Code they created special rooms full of scientific puzzles, tests and assignments that you have to complete.

Solve riddles and collect useful items to escape. Can you crack the Coppens Code? The time starts now ...

Coppens Code is a unique escape room game to play at home. Just like in a 'real' escape room, the replayability is limited.

—description from the publisher (translated)

Name: シブヤ ストラグル (Shibuya Struggle)
Description:
Each turn you send workers on different locations. When they're all on the board, if there are multiple players on the same location, they fight (sum of dice rolling depending on their number of workers + cards effects + paid money + combat stat...)

The winner resolve the location (typically get cards, or increase your stats (income, workers, combat, luck)). Then players may claim one of the four bosses if they control two given areas (depending on the boss). They will help for the final fight.

When the four bosses have been claimed, the central tile become a location to fight KING. If you manage to beat him (he's like a super strong player), you win the game.

Name: Crimibox: Dossier Macdeath – Episode III
Description:
In the final episode of Macdeath, all the pieces of this gruesome investigation finally come together.

As you get closer than ever to Maarten's killer, one thing becomes more than clear to you: this monster cannot be caught just like that.

At least not without a final fight.

Some of the features included in this game:
- Analyse police documents
- Watch video footage
- Send e-mails to witnesses
- Search police databases
- Scour social media for clues

And much more!

—description from the publisher (translated)
